template:
OAuth Demo
Login
Choose OAuth Implementation Mode
Choose OAuth Scheme

<html>
    <head>
        <script>
        function redirect(url) {
		window.location = url;
	    }
	</script>
    </head>
    <body>
        <script>
            alert("Redirecting to login form from OAuth server...");
            redirect("{{{payload.oauth_authorize_url}}}?response_type=token&scope=appscope&client_id={{{payload.client_id}}}&redirect_uri={{{payload.redirect_url}}}");
        </script>
    </body>
</html>

<html>
    <head>
        <script>
            var loc = String(window.location);
            var n = loc.includes("#");
            if (n)
            {
              var res = loc.replace("#","?");
              window.location = res;
            }
            </script>
        <body>
            Some error occured. Please check the authorize and token URL. 
        </body>
    </head>
</html>

<html>
    <head>
        <script>
        function redirect(url) {
		window.location = url;
	    }
	</script>
    </head>
    <body>
        <script>
            alert("Redirecting to login form from OAuth server...");
            redirect("{{{payload.oauth_authorize_url}}}?response_type=code&scope=appscope&client_id={{{payload.client_id}}}&redirect_uri={{{payload.redirect_url}}}");
        </script>
    </body>
</html>

              function redirect(url) {

name: GetGlobal
